00033 
00034 bool CMorphology::DilateFast(CStdImage& Img,unsigned short q10,unsigned short q20,unsigned short q30)
00035 {
00036 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00037         /* add comment to history */
00038         TString History;
00039         k_InitString(&History);
00040         k_SprintfString(&History,"%sCMorphology::DilateFast(q10=%d,q20=%d,q30=%d)",ipl_HistoryIndent,q10,q20,q30);
00041         Img.m_History.AppendIPL(History.pChars);
00042         k_EmptyString(&History);
00043         k_IplStartHistoryMacro();
00044 #endif
00045         /* call kernel function */
00046         bool ReturnValue=k_DilateFast(Img.GetTImagePtr(),q10,q20,q30);
00047         if (ReturnValue==false)
00048         {
00049                 ostringstream ost;
00050                 ost << "CMorphology::DilateFast() Fast dilation failed" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00051                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00052 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00053                 /* remove the history line added above */
00054                 Img.m_History.RemoveLastLine();
00055 #endif
00056         }
00057 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00058         /* end history appending (remove a leading '\t' character) */
00059         k_IplStopHistoryMacro();
00060 #endif
00061         return ReturnValue;
00062 }
00063

00072         k_EmptyString(&History);
00073         k_IplStartHistoryMacro();
00074 #endif
00075         /* call kernel function */

00078         {

00090 #endif

00092 }

00094 bool CMorphology::Erode(const CStdImage& ImgMask, CStdImage& Img)
00095 {
00096 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00097         /* add comment to history */
00098         TString History;
00099         k_InitString(&History);
00100         k_SprintfString(&History,"%sCMorphology::Erode() with dimensions (%d*%d)",
00101                 ipl_HistoryIndent,ImgMask.GetWidth(),ImgMask.GetHeight());
00102         Img.m_History.AppendIPL(History.pChars);
00103         k_EmptyString(&History);
00104         k_IplStartHistoryMacro();
00105 #endif
00106         /* call kernel function */
00107         bool ReturnValue=k_Erode(ImgMask.GetConstTImagePtr(),Img.GetTImagePtr());
00108         if (ReturnValue==false)
00109         {
00110                 ostringstream ost;
00111                 ost << "CMorphology::Erode() Erotion failed" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00112                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00113 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00114                 /* remove the history line added above */
00115                 Img.m_History.RemoveLastLine();
00116 #endif
00117         }
00118 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00119         /* end history appending (remove a leading '\t' character) */
00120         k_IplStopHistoryMacro();
00121 #endif
00122         return ReturnValue;
00123 }

00156 int CMorphology::Thinning(CStdImage& Img)
00157 {
00158 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00159         /* add comment to history */
00160         TString History;
00161         k_InitString(&History);
00162         k_SprintfString(&History,"%sCMorphology::Thinning())",ipl_HistoryIndent);
00163         Img.m_History.AppendIPL(History.pChars);
00164         k_EmptyString(&History);
00165         k_IplStartHistoryMacro();
00166 #endif
00167         /* call kernel function */
00168         int ReturnValue=k_Thinning(Img.GetTImagePtr());
00169         if (ReturnValue==-1)
00170         {
00171                 ostringstream ost;
00172                 ost << "CMorphology::Thinning() Thinning failed" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00173                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00174 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00175                 /* remove the history line added above */
00176                 Img.m_History.RemoveLastLine();
00177 #endif
00178         }
00179 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00180         /* end history appending (remove a leading '\t' character) */
00181         k_IplStopHistoryMacro();
00182 #endif
00183         return ReturnValue;

00216 int CMorphology::SkeletonZhou(CStdImage& Img, bool PreserveCorners)
00217 {
00218 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00219         /* add comment to history */
00220         TString History;
00221         k_InitString(&History);
00222         k_SprintfString(&History,"%sCMorphology::SkeletonZhou())",ipl_HistoryIndent);
00223         Img.m_History.AppendIPL(History.pChars);
00224         k_EmptyString(&History);
00225         k_IplStartHistoryMacro();
00226 #endif
00227         /* call kernel function */
00228         int ReturnValue=k_SkeletonZhou(Img.GetTImagePtr(),PreserveCorners);
00229         if (ReturnValue==-1)
00230         {
00231                 ostringstream ost;
00232                 ost << "CMorphology::SkeletonZhou() Skeletonizing with Zhou algotithm failed" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00233                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00234 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00235                 /* remove the history line added above */
00236                 Img.m_History.RemoveLastLine();
00237 #endif
00238         }
00239 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00240         /* end history appending (remove a leading '\t' character) */
00241         k_IplStopHistoryMacro();
00242 #endif
00243         return ReturnValue;
00244 }
